title: IREDA signs MoU with SJVN, GMR for 900 MW hydro project in Nepal
description: Indian Renewable Energy Development Agency has signed agreements with SJVN and GMR Energy to develop the 900 MW Upper Karnali hydro-electric project in Nepal. This collaboration aims to boost regional energy security and promote renewable energy infrastructure, enhancing cooperation between India and Nepal for sustainable growth.
